name: PostIt
description: This is a content sharing website where you can share your post with others

scripts.test: (export knex_test='./database/testDb.db'; rm -f $knex_test;export knex_env='test';export db='testDb.db';npm run setUpKnex;./shell_scripts/setTestDb.sh $knex_test ;nyc mocha)
scripts.setUpKnex: touch $knex_test; NODE_ENV=test npm run knex migrate:latest;
scripts.start: sudo apt-get install sqlite3; export db=postitDB.db; touch database/postitDB.db; export knex_development=./database/postitDB.db; export knex_env=development; ./shell_scripts/setDb.sh database/postitDB.db; node server.js
